channel.title: CVE Feed for SoftLab -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SoftLab -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-52177|2024-06-12T19:29:08.907Z -- softlab -- integrate%20google%20drive
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in SoftLab Integrate Google Drive.This issue affects Integrate Google Drive: from n/a through 1.3.3.

item.title: CVE-2024-29771|2024-06-04T17:58:02.661Z -- softlab -- dracula%20dark%20mode%20-%20the%20revolutionary%20dark%20mode%20plugin%20for%20wordpress
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in SoftLab Dracula Dark Mode - The Revolutionary Dark Mode Plugin For WordPress allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Dracula Dark Mode - The Revolutionary Dark Mode Plugin For WordPress: from n/a through 1.0.8.
